amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that States affirmatively pass legislation enacting provisions of the bill before the bill can go into effect in that State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-283 to specify that the legislation can only go into effect in states that have passed legislation enacting the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCarthy (NY) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 274 (Roll no. 844).
